nodes.text: Imperial-class spaceport, also known as Imperial class starport, was a classification of spaceport based on the services available. Luxurious and modern, an Imperial-class spaceport boasts an array of docking facilities, storage bays, and maintenance facilities. Amenities are available fo ship crews and passengers, and merchants often maintained their offices at the port, enabling starship captains to complete their business without ever leaving the confines of the spaceport.

Repair and maintenance services were of the highest quality, and customs officials were present and generally were competent at their job. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the Imperial Military maintained a significant presence at Imperial-class spaceports.
The Gall Spaceport was an Imperial-class starport. There was also an Imperial-class spaceport in Oradin.
